summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning, amending height and rooftop features provisions in downtown, commercial and industrial zones by amending the following Sections in Title 23, Seattle Land Use Code, of the Seattle Municipal Code: 23.41.012, 23.47.012, 23.49.008; 23.49.048; 23.49.068; 23.49.098; 23.49.124; 23.49.150; 23.49.210; 23.49.328; 23.49.342; 23.50.012; 23.50.020; 23.50.022; 23.50.027; and 23.50.028.
